dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale not given. (E 79°22'00"--E 82°04'00"/N 10°02'00"--N 5°43'00") Relief shown pictorially. Likely from Cosmographiae Universalis by Sebastian M ünster. Latin text and page number on verso: Tapro-bana... 22. Dimensions: 31 x 39 centimeters
dcat_keyword_sm: Sri Lanka Maps Early Works to 1800
